summary: This appears to be an email forwarding documentation about Jeffrey Epstein's inmate information, sent from an Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The email includes attachments containing Epstein's details and was sent on August 10, 2019, the day after his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the documentation being forwarded; identified by his inmate registration number 73618-054.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Documentation about Jeffrey Epstein's inmate information was forwarded via email on August 10, 2019.
The email originated from an Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The email includes attachments: TEXT.htm, Epsteinjeffrey_Edward,_Reg._No._73618-054_information.docx, and a vcf file.
The date of the email (August 10, 2019) is the day after Epstein's death in custody.
